metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26963 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Repeated calls to the history and location interfaces could have been used to hang the browser. This was addressed by introducing rate-limiting to these API calls. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 83.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '83.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
